system.effect: The attack flash-fries the target's leg, cooking chunks of flesh into char. The target must pass a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer 1 level of Fatigue.

description.value:
Energy Damage to Leg (Severity 2)

The attack flash-fries the target's leg, cooking chunks of flesh into char. The target must pass a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer 1 level of Fatigue.
